language.entry: My body has become transparent!
I am losing all sensation, oh no!
I am becoming ethereal!
I am corporeal again. What a relief.
My sensations return. Phew...
I am no longer phantasmal. I hope that does not happen again...
Ooooh! I am suddenly arroused!
Whether this is bloodlust or simply lust, I am physically stimulated!
Ah, I am all hot and bothered! Perhaps I should drop this mirror!
The sensation fades. Hopefully it returns soon!
Ahhh, I've calmed down...
That was rather pleasant, but it is gone now...
Ooh, I have hardened!
An aura protects me. Perhaps an effect of my eldritch dealings?
I am not as soft as I look!
Oh, I am back to being soft and squishy...
My protection has weared off...
My eldritch shield has disappeared...
Hello? Why is everyone ignoring me?!
Such a shame. My beauty is unseen to the world!
I consider this invisibility more of a curse than a boon, but I will have to make due.
I am still hardened!
Hehe! I am impenetrable!
Regardless of its source, this strange shielding is rather convenient!
I always remember protection! *wink wink*
I must preserve my form!
I am not as easy a target as you might think!
Hehe! They are distracted by that which they cannot have!
They look upon my perfect physique and have become mesmerized!
The rabble can continue to stare, it only makes them easy targets!
Hideous form is synonymous with a lack of confidence, and they are truly hideous creatures!
Hmph. Even my nymph-like form is more menacing than their poor excuse for strength!
They are underperforming. How unfortunate for them!
Hehe! My kisses are venomous!
I can still spit poisons, even while in this form!
My bite is just as lethal as my talk!
You should know, I find heroism VERY attractive! *wink*
What is a "doot"? Regardless, I find you all very heroic!
Who will be my shining knight today? I have a special reward just for them! *wink*
I am so vigorous today!
I have unlimited stamina to push on!
Despite what my body endures, I do not tire!
Oh an encore? Well of course!
~While you live, shine! ~Have no grief at all!
My voice is quite angelic, is it not? Let me give you another sample!
My gift, please don't take it away from me!
I-I can't bear the thought of losing my beauty again!
They see me as an easy target, and I am!
I-I don't want to die like this!
You are all jealous! You want to take my gift away from me!
Repulsive things! If you want what I've earned, you'll have to kill me for it!
You think you can have your way with me?! You're terribly mistaken!
Trying to swindle a woman like me?! You'll quickly regret your actions!
Which of us is the real monster...
I'M HIDEOUS!!!
How could I not see?! I am flawed!
Disfigurement will restore my wondrous grandeur!
My whole body is repulsive! I must be remade!
MAKE ME BEAUTIFUL!!!
To think I graced you with my presence, thinking you could be useful.
Why do I travel with you babbling homunculi?
Ugh, you all dance around like grotesque animals.
You think we're equals?! You're merely pawns to me!
You are all repugnant children, nothing more.
Aren't you all valiant heroes?! PROTECT ME!
I live a life of luxury, you should all be serving ME!
I'm too beautiful to die. You on the other hand...
Woe is me, forced to work with such incompetent fools...
I'll never forgive you for your failures, unless you give me all your earnings.
My magnificence...just an illusion...
Everything I have, I've stolen. Perhaps now I shall pay the price...
I reclaimed my beauty, but at what cost...
I sought to rejoin society, but now I see the error of my ways...
I am no different from the monsters I fight...
N-no! NOT THE FIRE!!!
The flame! Put it out! PUT IT OUT!!!
They are so perfect...I must have them!
Yes! That one will be perfect for me!
Ahh! Help, I'm a damsel in distress!!!
Fear not, friends! I will not let you die!
In my care, you will not fall today!
These repulsive beasts fight for themselves, we fight with purpose!
We are heroes! We will overcome these monstrosities!
We fight with clarity, we will prevail!
We have purpose! We will triumph over these animals!
Come now, friends! Show them your might!
Their strength is an illusion, we will prevail!
Beauty like mine is eternal! No creature can take that away from me!
Many attempts have been made on my life, and none have succeeded!
I've been thrown to the mud, and have transcended!
I've achieved feats that no woman could even dream of!
*soothing singing*
Think of the tales they will tell of our accomplishments!
My my. You're so heroic!
Need some motivation? *kiss*
The creatures of darkness flee before our radiance!
In pure darkness, the righteous light shines brightest!
I've escaped death countless times! This encounter will be no different!
Eldritch blood courses through my veins!
Ah! I'm too perfect to die!
SAVE ME!!!
My beauty! You can't take it away from me again!
Mankind took my gift away! It will not do so again!
Malevolence in your eyes! I know what you plan!
You are all covetous creatures! Wanting what you don't have!
*incoherent sobbing*
Why am I cursed with this hideous form?!
Please, make me beautiful again!
You are all useless! Just a bunch of cowards pretending to be heroes!
I didn't expect much, but this is just apalling.
All this extra work I must do to keep this group alive. So tiring.
*sigh* I would REALLY like a courageous hero to protect me right now.
You're going to let a defenseless lady like me die? Tsk tsk...
I'm in need of saving! SAVE ME!!!
You've seen what I am, I know you are terrified of me...
I stole this beauty, but it does not hide what I truly am...
I am but a shadow of the woman I once was...
AAHHHHH!!! I'M BURNING ALIVE!!!
I love how ravishing that creature is!
Sorry you had to see me in this ghastly form! I'll revert back soon!
P-please save me from these revolting horrors!
HELP ME!!!
I can't die yet! I have so much to do!
Trying to sneak up on me now?!
Trying to stick a dagger in my back? I think not!
I feel exposed in this position!
Yes! That tool of yours will do nicely!
REMAKE ME!
I can't bear this repulsiveness any longer! FIX ME NOW!!!
Oh it's nervous! Let me start the conversation!
It doesn't even notice me! Maybe I need to get closer.
They're having so much fun. I want to join!
Oh great hero! Save me from this travesty!
Oh how kind of you to intervene!
Oh, my hero!
It is time that I join my kin...
Hunted by man and monster alike. It is time I accept my fate...
Please, I only ask for a swift death...
There is no beauty is such a brutal death!
Save me from this tragic fate!
I've suffered for my gift, it can't end like this!
Are you pocketing its treasure?! Move aside!
All earnings belong to me!
Back away! Its reward is mine!
I'm the damsel, you're the hero. So let's switch places.
Kill the ugly one first!
You take the blow, I don't want my perfection ruined.
*sobbing*
P-please spare me!
This is too much! I need a moment to think!
Everyone is against me! I must look out for myself!
Any action I make could mean my end!
I am at no risk if I refuse to react!
I've overexerted myself. Leave me be.
You handle the creatures while I collect the gold.
*yawn* I'm tired. Give me a moment.
Just let it be finished...
Make it a clean death. I won't even struggle...
Please...I just want to sleep...
AHHHH!!! I'M ON FIRE!!!
Oooooh! I'm so flustered!
*faint*
I'm not falling for your devious plan!
I see through your deception!
I know when I'm being manipulated!
FIX ME!
I WANT TO BE BEAUTIFUL!
PURGE ME OF MY HIDEOUSNESS!
I always have to cover for your idiotic mistakes.
UGH.
I have to take matters into my own hands.
You don't have any sway with me!
A lady has to look out for herself in this hell!
I do what I please!
Perhaps angering them will end this charade.
They're ignoring me? That's just insulting...
I'm right here you disgusting creature!
Courtship is so fun!
OH NO YOU DIDN'T!
HEY! HANDS OFF!
This fire. It reminds me of terrible times.
They lurk in the shadows, waiting to kill us...
Why do we dally? The wretched things will be upon us soon.
I am most safe away from all of you.
I know you think me some monster. I see it in your hateful eyes.
Typical, treating me like some abhorrent monster...
Help me flay my skin, it is part of the beautifying process!
I hear scars are attractive. Mind giving me some?
Do you have a dagger? I need to cut away this surplus of flesh.
So improper. This group of misfits isn't going to last the night.
How did I end up with this band of bumbling fools?
A lady like me, forced to rest with a herd of unruly man-children. *SIGH*
Give me your blankets. I want to rest comfortably tonight.
You should all be treating me like royalty, since I AM royalty.
If you REALLY cared about me, you would give me all of your supplies.
*silent crying*
You know what I am. Your act of kindness does not fool me...
Part of me was taken, and I was never able to get it back...
PUT THE FIRE OUT! IT FRIGHTENS ME!
*sobbing* Why didn't it like me?!
The rumors are lies! I don't suck the blood of children!
Right here! Cut THIS part off!
I want you to cut my face up! Like a BIG smile!
Can I get this extra flesh shaved off please?
You want an easy kill? Come right here...
I'm tired of the lies. I'm ready for death...
I'm ready for you!
Catch me if you can!
I definitely won't be needing this part!
I must cut all the ugly out of me!
Life is pain. I'm ready to die.
At least in death, everyone is the same...
Hold on! Let me take off my mask!
Here! Have a piece of my skin!
Trying to leave a defenseless woman for the monsters? How shameful!
I will not be left alone with the fiends!
There is a beauty in death. Let us embrace it together...
We'd be remembered as heroes if we die here...
Wait!!! I'm still being fixed!
I will not leave until I am BEAUTIFUL!
I'M IN THE MIDDLE OF A COURTSHIP HERE!!!
MIND YOUR MANNERS!!!
Ah! Not the face!
My beauty! It is being tarnished!
Of course you let the damsel take the hit, scoundrels!
Leaving a lady to die?! Have you no courage?!
Ah! Hit the ugly one instead!
I'm a damsel in distress! PROTECT ME!!!
Yes! I feel more beautiful already!
KEEP GOING!!!
Ooh so confident!
I didn't take you for the forthcoming type!
I like a monstrosity that takes initiative!
Oh you want to rip my skin off? So endearing!
P-please! A swift death is all I ask for!
No! I want to die beautiful!
I will not be fooled by your tricks!!
All seek to steal my beauty!
Do you hesitate to return me my beauty?!
Do not be afraid! I embrace the pain!
Oh, take me out for dinner first!
So aggressive, I like that!
You think killing it earns you its treasure? Hardly!
Its treasure is still mine, by the way.
Oh good, you do know how to use your weapon.
See, even an oaf like you can be useful.
What are you doing?! I was going to talk with it!
Please! Don't fight over me!
We are powerless against them!
It'd be best if we fled now!
I am human and monster, yet neither is my ally.
Every creature in this forsaken place seeks to steal my gift!
Ugh. I guess we're all going to die.
Would you like me to hit them for you? I believe I'd do a better job.
You'll be the next to die, I'm sure of it.
Well, you can still serve as a shield.
Please, you can barely imitate me!
Nice try. Maybe with some practice you can be half as beautiful as me.
That attack has disfigured you horribly! I do not want to suffer the same fate!
Such a horrendous attack! You look horrible!
I was hoping that attack would kill you...
Looks like the monsters are on my side now.
Such magnificent work! I'm jealous!
Why does that one get to be beautiful first?!
That's right, be a good shield.
Well, you're good at dying at least...
Oh I see you're taken!
Have fun you two! *wink*
They play with us, like toys!
Why can't this torment just end!
You think you can deceive me?! I see right through your ploy!
I trust no one! NO ONE!
Let me give you some advice. *whisper whisper*
Tsk tsk. Amateurs.
At least let me choose where I die!
JUST LET ME DIE!
Don't get too close, or I'll make you regret it!
Do you want me to kiss you? It won't be as pleasant as it sounds.
DO YOU MIND?! I'M IN THE MIDDLE OF MY PRECEDURE!
You want me to be ugly, don't you?! YOU DON'T CARE ABOUT ME!
Please. You are fine where you are.
You'll ruin everything if you go anywhere else.
Hush! Don't you see I'm having a conversation?
Don't intervene, child!
How stupid do you think I am?
Sabotage? Really?
How will this help me become beautiful?
This has no use to me.
Death is certain, so this is without merit.
Save it for someone with hope.
Sorry, I'm taken.
I humbly decline your gift.
My gift is all the healing I need.
I suspect ill intent and decline your offer.
Trying to make me trust you? I won't fall for it!
No! You'll ruin everything!
The blood is fresh! Let it dry!
Your witchery will make me hideous again!
You cannot mend this broken soul...
I've been broken too many times. Leave me...
Let the suffering end...
Psh! I won't accept your petty gift!
The quality of that stone insults my beauty!
I abhor that brand of enhancement.
Kindness always comes with a price, and I don't want to pay!
A clever trick, but I am a step ahead!
Away with you, wretched thing!
Your interference will only delay my remaking!
You only spoil my beauty!
YOU CANNOT MAKE ME BEAUTIFUL!
There is nothing beautiful in mending the broken...
No amount of care can erase my hideous truth...
You help me because you think me a friend. Think otherwise...
Flattery will get you nowhere.
Words of a hypocrite!
I have no interest in what you have to say.
Such morbid hideousness!
The sacrifice of flesh! It was necessary!
My countless hardships! They haunt my every thought!
Do know that our acts will be viewed as heroic and selfless!
The many deeds you have accomplished will attract you many admirers!
Do not fret, all will be fine.
Let me see. I have experience treating wounds.
This was my favorite fabric, but it'll serve well as a bandage for you.
There you go. Right as the rain!
Hardship has shaped me into a beautiful thing, it will do the same for you!
What troubles you? I am good as easing distress.
Lay your head on my lap. I will hum you a pleasant melody.
I cannot help others while those monsters haunt my thoughts!
My voice trembles, my allure fades!
I risk my life in this fragile form. The creatures will find me to be easy prey!
They exploit me for my kindness. I will not offer them such a virtue.
Perhaps they will leave me alone if I revert to my true form...
I try to keep appearances, but I will not do such a thing for a group of rats like you.
Come here. Let me make you beautiful just like me!
Do you like my face? Let me make you just like me!
Help me remove this excess skin!
I'd rather not waste my time with these man-children.
Am I expected to do all the work? Typical.
UGH.
I need a comfortable nap before I attend to you fools.
You all should really be serving ME.
And what do you have to offer in return for my kindness?
My services are all an illusion...
I've played this game for long enough. I am done now.
Surely you don't find me comforting now that you know what I really am...
A lady really shouldn't be handing out invitations like that!
Show me what you have first!
*licks ally*
Unhand me you unruly savage!
How dare you touch me, filth!
Seeking to end my life? You'll have to try harder than that!
Don't touch me, the scars are finally hardening!
You'll ruin my perfect complexion!
If you touch me, the process may be ruined!
Ugh, please.
Did I ask to be touched? No.
I wouldn't even consider it.
Leave me be. I want my final moments to be in peace...
I'm done playing this little game...
Save yourself the trouble...
*hissing*
*sticks tongue out*
This meal looks strange, perhaps it is laced in toxins!
I know poisoned food when I see it.
I need to shed some weight if I am to become truly beautiful.
I don't need the extra fat.
I am not hungry...
I cannot live like this anymore...
Ick! Bring me a proper meal!
I humbly decline. I shall dine on fire tonight!
I'd rather not keep up the second part of our bargain, if you don't mind.
STOP LOOKING AT ME!!!
You look at me like a monster, perhaps I'll show you one!
You fear them? Let me give something greater to fear!
GO AND KILL THEM!!!
Here! Let me show you what's under the skin!
How about a kiss?
The Temptress
Despite her divine beauty and soothing presence, this woman maintains a menacing air. Her light-hearted compliments and soft smile hide a more...insidious agenda...
A Dark Bargain
Once every blue moon, those that have dabbled with eldritch horrors must return once again to the tide to offer a trinket of obscure nature to maintain their elegant gift.

I can feel it...Death's embrace...
No creature can resist my allure!
I know, I'm perfect!
Stunned by my good looks?
I never fail to impress myself!
*wink*
My my!
I am very beautiful, am I not?
Lamia

Why do you look at me like so?
You seem startled, friends.
What? Are you stunned by my beauty?
Keep staring and I'll think you fancy me.
What is it? Have you never seen someone so perfect before?
The Veil
Cleansing Tide

LAMPREY'S KISS
A calming song should ease our minds from the horrors we've seen.
I'm going to...see to some personal matters.
I understand your jealousy, as I am the apotheosis of physical beauty.
Your jealousy helps to assure me of my perfection.
In my homeland, I was the envy of men and women alike.
Oh I could not imagine a life without my flawless physique.
Perhaps one day you could be half as elegent as me.
You don't look well, friend. Perhaps a kiss will cure your ailments?
Caregiver's Ring
Deceiver's Hairband
Encrusted Dagger
Fleeting Earrings
Gorgon's Shroud

"I am beautiful..."

Those of faith do not understand the curse I am afflicted with.
I'd be happy to, but that one doesn't seem to like me...
I know what that witch is, and I will not serve with it.
That creature is the anathema of everything I stand for.
I will not aid this monstrosity...

The pinnacle of physical beauty, the Lamia supports her allies using her eldritch powers to wash away wounds, vanquish fear, and lure enemies into their demise. However, when she is put in danger, she will reveal her true form. Becoming a hideous creature, she slithers about in the shadows, striking her prey when they least expect it with sharp claws, acid spit, and a petrifying gaze.

The Lamia possesses an eldritch trinket, taking the form of a shattered mirror, that grants her mystical powers and allows her to maintain her beautiful form . Obsessed with perfection, the Lamia will only go to battle in the highest quality robes, relying instead on the protection of her allies to stay alive.

The Lamia lacks the survival skills of a more seasoned adventurer. Instead she offers to entertain her companions with a soothing song and kind words. However, if the need arises, she will indulge in her own vanity at the cost of her companions' comfort and even revert to her monstrous nature to stalk enemies ahead.

The pinnacle of physical beauty, the Lamia supports her allies using her eldritch powers to wash away wounds, vanquish fear, and lure enemies into their demise. However, when she is put in danger, she will reveal her true form. Becoming a hideous creature, she slithers about in the shadows, striking her prey when they least expect it with sharp claws, acid spit, and a petrifying gaze.

The Lamia possesses an eldritch trinket, taking the form of a shattered mirror, that grants her mystical powers and allows her to maintain her beautiful form . Obsessed with perfection, the Lamia will only go to battle in the highest quality robes, relying instead on the protection of her allies to stay alive.

The Lamia lacks the survival skills of a more seasoned adventurer. Instead she offers to entertain her companions with a soothing song and kind words. However, if the need arises, she will indulge in her own vanity at the cost of her companions' comfort and even revert to her monstrous nature to stalk enemies ahead.

O pinculo da beleza fsica, a Lmia apoia seus aliados usando seus poderes de Esquecido para lavar feridas, vencer o medo e atrair os inimigos para a morte. No entanto, quando colocada em perigo ir revelar sua verdadeira forma. Tornando-se uma criatura horrorosa, deslizando nas sombras, golpeando suas presas quando menos esperam com garras afiadas, cuspe cido e um olhar petrificante.

A Lmia possui uma jia esquecida, assumindo a forma de um espelho quebrado, que lhe concede seus poderes msticos e lhe permite manter sua bela forma. Obcecada com a perfeio, a Lmia s vai batalha com vestes de alta qualidade, dependendo da proteo de seus aliados para se manter viva.

A Lmia no possui as habilidades de sobrevivncia dos aventureiro experientes. Em vez disso, ela oferece para entreter seus companheiros msica suave e palavras gentis. Contudo, se for necessrio, ela entregar sua prpria vaidade ao custo do conforto de seus companheiros e at retornar sua natureza abominvel para perseguir seus inimigos.

Lamia tm dvnou cetku ve form rozbitho zrcadla, kter j propjuje mystick schopnosti a umouje j si udret svou krsnou podobu. Posedl dokonalost, Lamia pjde do boje jen v nejlepch atech, spolh pitom svm peitm na svch spojencch.

So ein grauenhafter Schlag! Du siehst furchtbar aus!
Ich habe gehofft dieser Schlag wird dich umbringen...
Wie es aussieht stehen die Monster nun auf meiner Seite!
Welch umwerfende Arbeit! Ich beneide dich!
Warum darf der da zuerst schn sein?!
So ist es recht, sei ein gutes Schild.
Nun ja, du eignest dich immerhin gut zum sterben...
Oh, ich verstehe. Du bist bereits vergeben!
Viel Spass ihr beiden! *zwinker*
Die spielen mit uns, wie Spielzeug!
Warum kann diese Qual nicht einfach enden?
Du glaubst du kannst mich tuschen?! Ich habe deine Masche durchschaut!
Ich vertraue niemandem! NIEMANDEM!
Lasst mich euch einen Rat geben *flster flster*
Tss Tss Amateure.
Lasst mich immerhin entscheiden wo ich sterben werde!
LASST MICH EINFACH STERBEN!
Komm mir nicht zu nah, oder ich sorge dafr dass du es bereust!
Willst du das ich dich ksse? Es wird nicht so angenehm wie es sich anhrt.
ICH MUSS DOCH BITTEN?! ICH BEFINDE MICH MITTEN IN MEINER BEHANDLUNG!
Du willst das ich hsslich bin oder? ICH BIN DIR VLLIG EGAL!
Ich bitte dich. Du stehst da genau richtig!
Du ruinierst alles wenn du dich woanders hinstellst.
Husch! Siehst du nicht das ich mich gerade unterhalte?
Misch dich nicht ein, Kind!
Fr wie dumm hltst du mich?
Sabotage? Im ernst jetzt?
Wie soll das mir dabei helfen schn zu werden?
Das ist fr mich nutzlos.
Der Tod ist gewiss, von daher ist dies nicht von Belang!
Spar dir das fr jemanden auf, der noch Hoffnung hat!
Tut mir leid, ich bin vergeben.
Ich lehne dein Geschenk demtig ab.
Meine Gabe ist die einzige Heilung die ich brauche!
Ich vermute bswillige Absicht und lehne deinen Vorschlag ab.
Versuchst du mein Vertrauen zu gewinnen? Darauf fall ich nicht rein!
Nein! Du ruinierst alles!
Das Blut ist frisch! Lass es trocknen!
Deine Hexerei wird mich wieder hsslich machen!
Diese gebrochene Seele kannst du nicht heilen...
Ich wurde schon zu hufig zerstrt. Lasst mich...
Setzt dem Leid ein Ende...
Pfff! Ich akzeptiere dein jmmerliches Geschenk nicht!
Die Qualitt dieses Steins ist eine Beleidigung fr meine Schnheit!
Ich verabscheue diese Art von Verbesserung.
Freundlichkeit hat ihren Preis, und ich weigere mich zu bezahlen!
Ein cleverer Trick, aber ich bin bereits ein Schritt voraus!
Fort mit dir, du erbrmliches Ding!
Deine Einmischung wird meine Erneuerung bloss hinauszgern!
Du wirst mir blo meine Schnheit verderben!
DU KANNST MICH NICHT SCHN MACHEN!

Mit Schmeicheleien kommst du nicht weit.
Die Worte eines Heuchlers!
Mich interessiert nicht, was du zu sagen hast.
Solch morbide Abscheulichkeit!
Das Opfer von Fleisch! Es war notwendig!
Meine unzhligen Erschwernisse! Sie verfolgen jeden meiner Gedanken!
Wisst ihr das man eure Taten als heroisch und selbstlos betrachten wird!
Die vielen Taten die ihr vollbracht habt werden euch viele Bewunderer einbringen!
Macht euch keine Sorgen, alles wird gut.
Lass mich sehen. Ich habe Erfahrung in Wundbehandlung.
Das war mein lieblings Stoff, er eignet sich aber gut als Bandage fr euch.
Na bitte. Alles wieder gut!
Erschwernisse haben mir Schnheit gebracht, sie werden dasselbe fr dich tun!
Was bereitet dir Kummer? Ich bin gut darin ihn zu lindern.
Leg deinen Kopf auf meinen Scho. Ich werde dir eine angenehme Melodie summen.
Ich bin nicht in der Lage darin anderen zu helfen, whrend Monster meine Gedanken heimsuchen!
Meine Stimme zittert, meine Verlockung schwindet dahin!
Mein Leben ist, in dieser zerbrechlichen Form, in Gefahr. Diese Kreaturen werden mich als leichte Beute betrachten!
Sie nutzen meine Freundlichkeit nur aus. Ich werde ihnen keine solche Tugend anbieten.
Vielleicht lassen sie mich in frieden, wenn ich in meine wahre Gestalt zurckkehre...
Ich versuche in der Regel den Anschein zu wahren, aber nicht fr eine Gruppe Ratten wie euch.
Komm her. Ich mache dich so schn wie ich es bin!
Gefllt dir mein Gesicht? Lass mich dich zu meinem Zwilling formen.
Hilf mir diese berschssige Haut loszuwerden!
Ich vergeude besser keine Zeit mit diesem Haufen Kleinkinder.
Muss ich hier alles alleine machen? Typisch.
ARGH.
Ich brauche ein gemtliches Nickerchen, bevor ich mich euch Narren zuwende.
Ihr alle solltet wirklich MIR dienen!
Und was hast du als Gegenleistung fr meine Freundlichkeit anzubieten?
Meine Dienste sind eine reine Illusion...
Ich habe euer Spiel lange genug mitgespielt. Ich bin fertig.
Sicherlich fhlst du dich in meiner Anwesenheit nun weniger wohl, jetzt wo du weisst was ich wirklich bin...
Eine Dame sollte so wirklich keine Einladungen austeilen!
Zeigt mir zuerst was ihr habt!
*leckt Verbndeten*
Lass mich los, du widerspenstiger Wildling!
Wie kannst du es wagen mich anzufassen, du dreckiger?
Willst du mir mein Leben nehmen? Dann musst du dich schon mehr anstrengen!
Fass mich nicht an. Die Narben verhrten sich endlich!
Du ruinierst meinen perfekten Teint.
Wenn du mich anfasst, knnte das den ganzen Ablauf ruinieren.
Argh, bitte!
Hab ich dich darum gebeten mich anzufassen? Nein!
Ich wrde es nicht einmal in Erwgung ziehen.
Lass mich in ruhe. Ich will meine letzten Stunden in Frieden verbringen...
Ich bin fertig mit diesem kleinen Spielchen...
Spar dir die mhe...
*faucht*
*streckt die Zunge raus*
Diese Mahlzeit sieht seltsam aus, vermutlich ist sie mit Toxinen gewrzt!
Ich erkenne vergiftetes Essen, wenn ich es sehe.
Ich muss noch etwas an Gewicht verlieren wenn ich wahrhaft schn werden will.
Ich brauche das zustzliche Fett nicht.
Ich habe keinen Hunger...
Ich kann so nicht weiterleben...
Igitt! Bring mir ein anstndiges Mahl!
Ich lehne demtig ab. Ich labe mich heut Nacht am Feuer!
Ich wrde den zweiten Teil unserer Abmachung, lieber nicht einhalten wenn es euch nichts ausmacht.
GLOTZ MICH NICHT SO AN!!!
Wenn du mich weiter wie ein Monster angaffst, dann zeige ich dir eins!
Machen sie dir Angst? Ich gebe dir einen richtigen Grund dich zu frchten!
GEH UND TTE SIE!!!
Hier! Ich zeige dir was sich unterhalb der Haut befindet!
Wie wrs mit einem Kuss?

Ein dunkles Abkommen

Der Gipfel krperlicher Schnheit, Die Lamia, untersttzt mit Hilfe ihrer Eldritch Krfte ihre Verbndeten indem sie ihre Wunden heilt, sie ihre Furcht berwinden lsst und ihre Feinde in ihr Verderben lockt. Wenn die Lamia in Gefahr schwebt, offenbart sie ihre wahre Gestalt. Sie verwandelt sich in eine grssliche und furchterregende, Schlangenhnliche Kreatur, die sich durch die Schatten schlngelt, und mit scharfen Klauen, versteinerndem Blick und tzendem Speichel zuschlgt wenn ihre Beute es am wenigsten erwartet.

Die Lamia besitzt ein Eldritch Schmuckstck in Form eines zerbrochenen Spiegels der ihr mystische Krfte verleiht und ihr gestattet ihr wunderschnes usseres zu wahren. Besessen von dem Gedanken an Perfektion, kleidet sich die Lamia nur in den feinsten Gewndern. Sie verweigert Rstungen jeder Art und verlsst sich in Kampfsituationen stattdessen, auf die Hilfe ihrer Verbndeten um am Leben zu bleiben.

Der Lamia mangelt es an den berlebensfertigkeiten der erfahreneren Abenteurer. Stattdessen bietet sie an ihre Verbndeten mit beruhigenden Gesngen und freundlichen Worten zu unterhalten. Und dennoch sollte die Notwendigkeit bestehen, wird sie auf Kosten des Komforts ihrer Verbndeten ihrer Eitelkeit verfallen oder sogar sich in ihre monstrse Gestalt zurckverwandeln um den Feinden die noch vor ihr liegen nachzustellen.

Ucielenienie fizycznego pikna. Lamia uywajc mistycznych mocy wspiera swoich sprzymierzecw, aby zmy ich rany i pomc im przezwyciy strach, a take potrafi zwabia swych wrogw w puapk. Jednake, gdy zostanie naraona na niebezpieczestwo, ujawni ona sw prawdziw posta. Stajc si ohydnym stworem, peznie w cieniu, uderzajc swoje ofiary, gdy te najmniej si tego spodziewaj, uywajc ostrych pazurw, zabjczego jadu i spojrzenia ktre zamienia wrogw w kamie.

Lamia posiada zaklty artefakt w postaci zbitego lustra, ktre nadaje jej mistyczne moce i pozwala jej utrzymywa sw pikn form. Dca zawsze do perfekcji Lamia udaje si na bitw w najpikniejszym ubiorze, w gwnej mierze powierzajc sw ochron sojusznikom, aby mc pozosta przy yciu.

Lamia nie posiada umiejtnoci wprawnego poszukiwacza przygd. Zamiast tego oferuje rozrywk swoim towarzyszom w postaci kojcych pieni i miych sw. Jednake, jeli zajdzie taka potrzeba, odda si wasnej prnoci, by poprawi swoje samopoczucie, kosztem swoich towarzyszy, a take moe powrci do postaci bestii, by przeladowa wrogw na swej drodze.

Como pinculo de la belleza corporal, la Lamia apoya a sus aliados usando sus poderes sobrenaturales para limpiar heridas, doblegar el miedo y atraer a sus enemigos a la perdicin. Sin embargo, cuando se encuentre en peligro revelar su verdadera forma. Convirtindose en una criatura espeluznante, repta a travs de las sombras atacando a sus presas inesperadamente, usando sus afiladas garras, escupitajos corrosivos y una mirada petrificante.

La Lamia posee una baratija sombra, tomando la forma de un espejo agrietado, que le otorga msticas habilidades y le permite mantener su cautivadora forma. Obsesionada con la perfeccin, la Lamia slo luchar usando sus ropajes ms finos, dependiendo de la proteccin de sus aliados para sobrevivir.

La Lamia carece de las habilidades de supervivencia de los aventureros curtidos. En su lugar, ofrece entretener a sus compaeros con una meloda relajante y palabras de amabilidad. Sin embargo, si aparece la necesidad, se dar gusto con su belleza al precio de la comodidad de sus acompaantes, e incluso regresar a su naturaleza abominable para acosar a sus enemigos.

The pinnacle of physical beauty, the Lamia supports her allies using her eldritch powers to wash away wounds, vanquish fear, and lure enemies into their demise. However, when she is put in danger, she will reveal her true form. Becoming a hideous creature, she slithers about in the shadows, striking her prey when they least expect it with sharp claws, acid spit, and a petrifying gaze.

The Lamia possesses an eldritch trinket, taking the form of a shattered mirror, that grants her mystical powers and allows her to maintain her beautiful form . Obsessed with perfection, the Lamia will only go to battle in the highest quality robes, relying instead on the protection of her allies to stay alive.

The Lamia lacks the survival skills of a more seasoned adventurer. Instead she offers to entertain her companions with a soothing song and kind words. However, if the need arises, she will indulge in her own vanity at the cost of her companions' comfort and even revert to her monstrous nature to stalk enemies ahead.

L'apice della bellezza fisica, la Lamia aiuta i suoi alleati usando i suoi poteri sovrannaturali per curare le loro ferite, combattere la paura e attirare i nemici in trappola. Quando si trova in pericolo, rivela la sua vera forma. Trasformandosi in una creatura orribile, striscia nelle tenebre, colpendo la sua preda quando meno se lo aspetta con artigli affilati, bava acida e lo sguardo pietrificante.

Lo specchio rotto della Lamia un ornamento sovrannaturale che le conferisce poteri mistici e le permette di mantenere la sua bellezza. Ossessionata dalla perfezione fisica, la Lamia scender in battaglia solo adornata delle migliori vesti, affidandosi alla protezione dei suoi alleati per rimanere in vita.

La Lamia non possiede le abilit di sopravvivenza di un avventuriero. Canzoni rassicuranti e parole gentili rassicurano gli animi dei suoi compagni. Purtroppo, se necessario, la vanit aiuter il suo morale a scapito di quello dei suoi compagni. La sua forma mostruosa pu tornare utile per braccare le bestie che la inseguono.
